reporter_caption.center: BURRELL v. CITY OF LORAIN, 175 Ohio St. 285 (1963)

caption.center: BURBELL, APPELLANT v. CITY OF LORAIN, APPELLEE.

opinion.posture: APPEAL from the Court of Appeals for Lorain County.
opinion.opinion_text:
The appeal as of right herein is dismissed for the reason that no substantial constitutional question is involved.
ZIMMERMAN, MATTHIAS, O'NEILL, GRIFFITH and GIBSON, JJ., concur.
